verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Glorious, shout it out and
Glorious, make it louder
Jesus, we shout Your name
Jesus, we make Your praise
Glorious, You are glorious
God, You are glorious

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My God You reign, forever and ever
How great Your name
Your love remains, forever and ever
You stay the same

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
PreShout it out, shout it out, if you know He's good
Sing it out, sing it out, for the Lord is good
Shout it out loud, You are glorious

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
PreShout it out, shout it out, if you know He's good

verse.name: c5
verse.lines:
Glorious, shout it out and
Glorious, make it louder
Jesus, we shout Your name
Jesus, we make Your praise
Glorious, You are glorious

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Shine Jesus
You shine for all the world to see
You are glorious
Shine Jesus
You shine for all the world to see
You are glorious
Shine Jesus
You shine for all the world to see
You are glorious (You are glorious)
You are glorious (You are glorious)

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Oh-oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh-ooh
Oh-oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh-ooh
Oh-oh-ooh, God, You are glorious
Oh-oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh-ooh
Oh-oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh-ooh
Oh-oh-ooh, God, You are glorious
